pages.text: Mud is found under water in non-ocean biomes. It applies a slowing movement speed modifier. Can be used to generate mudstone.
Generates as disks in rivers and oceans. Can be mined by a pan to yeild resources.
Generates as the bottom layer of the Nether. Can be mined by a pan to yield resources. Tagged as #minecraft:sand.
Generates as a sill (disk) in stones. Source of phosphorus.
Generates as a sill (disk) in sandstones. Source of iron.
